name: A Visual Novel Gaming Portal: Play Anywhere
blurb: We make Visual Novels, games that tell a story. We need your help to keep doing it!

rewards.reward: CURIOUS CUSTOMER: A free copy of the first episode of Novus Magus Amorous, one of our in-house developed games. PLUS, everyone who pledges is going to become an \u201cEarly Adopter\u201d which means on the site they will have a special forum tag that will give them access to bonus content and early betas!

INTREPID EXPLORER: A free copy of the first SEASON of Novus Magus Amorous. PLUS, everyone who pledges at this stage is going to become an \u201cEarly Riser\u201d which means on the site they will have a special forum tag that will give them access to bonus content, betas, AND have more influence in our online polls and game discussions that helps us determine what we put in our games!

DARING ADVENTURER: All of the above, plus a free copy of the first season of every in-house game we make currently in development (currently Novus Magus Amorous, Incubus, Western-Pirate Crossover, A Zombie Survival Mini-RPG, A Gothic Fantasy Epic, and many more!), and a \u201cspecial thanks\u201d in-game credit in the game of your choice.

CYBER-VIP: All of the above, PLUS Super-Special-Awesome insider access to all in-house titles as a beta-tester before release AND for all future extra content. All beta-testers on this level will be able to have a say in the creation of games as they give feedback and decide what goes in and what doesn\u2019t. See and help shape the game before anyone else, get a leg up on the less worthy, and hunt exclusive easter-eggs. You will be envied.

CHAMBER OF BAMF: All of the above, PLUS you get to be in a one-time only event: appear in one of our games as a caricature of yourself (A Mighty Magician? A Voluptuous Villain?), AND you get a portrait of your favorite characters (up to 3) drawn and signed by one of our brilliant artists! Also, in addition to your in-game credit, you\u2019ll be able to write a two-line bio of yourself on our site with a link to your personal page. You know, to let everyone know that you\u2019re a BAMF.

Big. Damn. Hero! : All of the above, PLUS your own 10-15 minute story arc in a game of your choice w/ a Super-Special-Awesome badge in your gamer profile to let everyone know that you\u2019re our Big-Damn-Hero. You will also receive an invite to any future real-world gatherings of the CWS community (likely held at major game conferences, science-fiction, comic-book, and Anime conventions). Let us take you out for drinks and dinner :)

THE BOSS: All of the above, PLUS inclusion on the CWS Board of Gaming Design, which allows you to sit it on all of our game design meetings and be part of the creative process for one full year (longer if we like you). On top of this, we will make a mini-game for you (about half an hour in length, or longer if we like the idea)! Let us help you.

THE MASTERMIND: (All of the above +) Want to single-handedly fund our project and win the hearts, minds, and souls of everyone at CWS Software? If you pledge $5,000 or more, you will receive all of the above, PLUS we will happily make our next game at your bidding. Think of it, anything you desire using us and the DateEngine (limit six hours in length, unless we like the idea). We will also address/refer to you as \u201cMaster\u201d or any other Overlord-title of your choice. Oh and hey, we'll totally fly out and buy you lunch. You deserve it, Master.
